sen.j: 尾上 菊次郎（おのえ きくじろう）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Kikujiro ONOE was a kabuki actor.
Kikujiro ONOE was a name used by Kabuki actors.
sen.cmt: was a kabuki actor→was a name used by Kabuki actorsとしました。
sen.e: Kikujiro ONOE was a name used by Kabuki actors.
Kikujiro ONOE the first
Kikujiro ONOE the First
Kikujiro ONOE the First
He was a disciple of Kikugoro ONOE the third.
sen.cmt: 「ハイフンを入れると計算式になるので、省力して翻訳しています」
sen.e: He was a disciple of Kikugoro ONOE the Third.
He was a disciple of Kikugoro ONOE the Third.
His Haimyo (name for Haiku (Japanese poetry)) was Sencho.
His haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Sencho.
His haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Sencho.
Kikujiro ONOE the second
Kikujiro ONOE the Second
Kikujiro ONOE the Second
His Haimyo was Baika (plum blossom).
sen.cmt: 「ハイフンを入れると計算式になるので、省力して翻訳しています」
sen.e: His haimyo was Baika (plum blossom).
His haimyo was Baika (plum blossom).
His stage family name was Otowaya.
His stage family name was Otowaya.
His stage family name was Otowaya.

sen.j: ひょっとこ面ともおかめ面とも言われるほど容貌は悪かったが世話女房役で人気を得た。
sen.e: He had such plain features as being called clownish face or plump-cheek face, but was popular with the role of a devoted wife.
He had such plain features as being called clownish face or plump-cheek face, but was popular with the role of a devoted wife.
He had such plain features as being called clownish face or plump-cheek face, but was popular with the role of a devoted wife.
Kikujiro ONOE the third
Kikujiro ONOE the Third
Kikujiro ONOE the Third
His Haimyo was Oyu and Baika..
sen.cmt: 「ハイフンを入れると計算式になるので、省力して翻訳しています」
sen.e: His haimyo were Oyu and Baika.
sen.cmt: haimyoとし、was→wereに修正、余分なピリオド削除
sen.e: His haimyo were Oyu and Baika.
His stage family name was Otowaya.
His stage family name was Otowaya.
His stage family name was Otowaya.

sen.j: 前名8代目尾上芙雀（ふじゃく）
sen.e: His former name was the eighth Fujaku ONOE.
His former name was Fujaku ONOE the Eighth.
sen.cmt: Fujaku ONOE the Eighthとしました。

sen.j: 前名は4代目坂東竹三郎。
sen.e: His former name was the fourth Takesaburo BANDO.
His former name was Takesaburo BANDO the Fourth.
sen.cmt: Takesaburo BANDO the Fourthとしました。
sen.e: His former name was Takesaburo BANDO the Fourth.

sen.j: 養子は坂東竹三郎 (5代目)。
sen.e: His adopted child is the fifth Takesaburo BANDO.
His adopted child is Takesaburo BANDO the Fifth.
